SELECT SI.DMND_NO AS dmndNo, SI.SR_NO AS srNo, S1.SYS_NM AS sysNm, T.TASK_SE_NM AS taskSeNm, SD.TTL AS ttl, M.FLNM AS flnm, SI.BGNG_YMD AS bgngYmd, SI.END_YMD AS endYmd, S2.STTS_NM AS sttsNm FROM SR_INFORMATION SI, SR_DEMAND SD, TASK T, MEMBERS M, SYSTEMS S1, STATUS S2
, SR_RESOURCES R
WHERE SD.DMND_NO = SI.DMND_NO AND SD.TASK_SE_CD = T.TASK_SE_CD AND SD.CUST_ID = M.MEMBER_ID AND S1.SYS_CD = SD.SYS_CD AND S2.STTS_CD = SD.STTS_CD
AND SD.SYS_CD = #{srInfoFilter.sysCd}
AND SD.TASK_SE_CD = #{srInfoFilter.taskSeCd}
AND SD.STTS_CD = #{srInfoFilter.sttsCd}
AND SD.TTL LIKE '%'||#{srInfoFilter.ttl}||'%'
AND SD.DMND_NO LIKE '%'||#{srInfoFilter.dmndNo}||'%'
AND R.SR_NO = SI.SR_NO AND R.EMP_ID = #{srInfoFilter.empId}
AND SI.PIC_ID = #{srInfoFilter.empId}
order by SD.DMND_YMD DESC
, dmndNo DESC
order by dmndNo ASC
order by bgngYmd DESC
order by bgngYmd ASC
order by endYmd DESC
order by endYmd ASC
OFFSET #{pager.startRowNo}-1 ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pager.rowsPerPage} ROWS ONLY
SELECT DEPT_CD AS deptCd, DEPT_NM AS deptNm FROM DEPARTMENTS
SELECT FLNM AS flnm, MEMBER_ID AS memberId FROM DEPARTMENTS D, MEMBERS M WHERE D.MNGR_ID = M.MEMBER_ID AND D.DEPT_CD = #{deptCd}

SELECT SD.STTS_CD AS sttsCd, SI.DMND_NO AS dmndNo, M.MEMBER_ID AS memberId, D.DEPT_NM AS deptNm, M.FLNM AS flnm, to_char(SI.BGNG_YMD, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS bgngYmd, to_char(SI.END_YMD, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endYmd, SI.RVW_CN AS rvwCn, SI.DEPT_CD AS deptCd FROM SR_INFORMATION SI, MEMBERS M, DEPARTMENTS D, SR_DEMAND SD WHERE SI.DMND_NO = #{dmndNo} AND SI.DEPT_CD = D.DEPT_CD AND SI.PIC_ID = M.MEMBER_ID AND SI.DMND_NO = SD.DMND_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE SR_INFORMATION SET BGNG_YMD = #{srplanInfomation.bgngYmd}, END_YMD = #{srplanInfomation.endYmd}, DEPT_CD = #{srplanInfomation.deptCd}, PIC_ID = #{srplanInfomation.memberId}, RVW_CN = #{srplanInfomation.rvwCn} WHERE DMND_NO = #{srplanInfomation.dmndNo}
UPDATE SR_INFORMATION SET PRGRS_YN = '0', END_YMD = sysdate WHERE SR_NO = #{srNo}
UPDATE SR_INFORMATION SET END_YMD = SYSDATE WHERE SR_NO = #{srNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SR_INFORMATION ( SR_NO, DMND_NO, DEPT_CD, PIC_ID, RNK, BGNG_YMD, END_YMD) VALUES (#{srNo}, #{dmndNo}, #{deptCd}, #{picId}, #{rnk}, #{bgngYmd}, #{endYmd})
mapper.select: SELECT si.dmnd_no as dmndNo, si.sr_no as srNo FROM sr_demand sd INNER JOIN sr_information si ON sd.dmnd_no = si.dmnd_no WHERE sd.CUST_ID = #{custId}
mapper.update: UPDATE SR_INFORMATION SET END_YMD = SYSDATE WHERE DMND_NO = #{dmndNo}
mapper.select: select max(sr_no) from sr_information where bgng_ymd = ( select max(bgng_ymd) from sr_information where pic_id = #{picId}) order by sr_no

SELECT rn, dmndNo, srNo from ( select rownum as rn, dmndNo, srNo from ( select SI.DMND_NO AS dmndNo, SI.SR_NO AS srNo FROM SR_INFORMATION SI, SR_DEMAND SD where si.dmnd_no = sd.dmnd_no order by SD.DMND_YMD DESC ) ) WHERE dmndNo = #{dmndNo}
